body:
I'm trying to install `pygtk` for `python3`

`spack install --use-cache py-pygtk%gcc@7.3.0 ^python@3.6.5 ^glib@2.55.1`

I need to specify `^glib@2.55.1` because newer glib fails to compile on our HPC (https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/7607)
